Package com.diy.hardware

Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.diy.hardware.Product
Direct Known Subclasses:
BarcodedProduct, PLUCodedProduct
public abstract class Product extends Object
Abstract base class for products. Note that a "product" is the kind of item (e.g., 2 litre container of Dairyland brand 2% milk) and not an individual item, which would be the specific physical object (e.g., that bottle of milk and not this one).

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      protected Product(long price, boolean isPerUnit)
      Create a product instance.
      Parameters:
      price - The price per unit or per kilogram.
      isPerUnit - True if the price is per unit; false if it is per kilogram.
      Throws:
      SimulationException - If the price is null or ≤0.

  • Method Details

    • getPrice

      public long getPrice()
      Gets the price of the product.
      Returns:
      The price. Cannot be null. Must be >0.

    • isPerUnit

      public boolean isPerUnit()
      Tests whether the price is per-unit, as opposed to per-kilogram.
      Returns:
      true if the price is per-unit; otherwise, false.
